CustomField.description: This field is created for the product rule "ACT-CM&VG-36MO Must Be Applied" to exclude fee for upsells in EMEA
CustomField.formula: AND( OR( CONTAINS( SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c , 'EMEA'), CONTAINS(Owner_Profile__c , 'EMEA'), CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, 'EMEA') ), ISPICKVAL( SBQQ__Type__c , 'Amendment') )
CustomField.label: Is EMEA?
